pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BolinetteBolinette is a Python web framework built on top of [aiohttp](https://github.com/aio-libs/aiohttp).[Read the complete docs here!](https://docs.bolinette.org/)## Install### PrerequisitesBolinette requires Python 3.10.Get it from the [official sources](https://www.python.org/downloads/).Be sure to install the pip and virtualenv extensions.### Create your project folder```shmkdir my-project && cd my-project```### Install BolinetteWith a virtual environment:```shpython3.9 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install pip --upgrade && pip install bolinette```Globally, with admin rights:```shpip install pip --upgrade && pip install bolinette```## Use the Bolinette CLI### Initialize your project```shblnt init app my_project```You will then be asked a few questions about the new project.### Useful commands```shblnt run server //runs the development serverblnt init db [-s] //creates tables in database [and runs seeders]blnt new [model|service|controller] //creates new files from generic templates```Find all available commands with `blnt -h`.
